channel.title: I got server source now how do i change the name?
channel.description: how do i change the name of my testscape server to jacobyscape. when i log in i want it to say "welcome to jacobyscape".

item.title: I got server source now how do i change the name?
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

Ok … open your client.java and search (ctrl + f)

welcome to jaycobyscape
Then change tit to the name you want! ( easy )

Read full topic
item.source: I got server source now how do i change the name?

item.title: I got server source now how do i change the name?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

in more detail for him…

Right click client.java, click edit, then hold ctrl + f, then type the name of the server, and replace with yours. then save teh changes and compile then run.

Read full topic

item.title: I got server source now how do i change the name?
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

go to client and go to search typ in the name of the source you downloaded , press search then just change to name to what you want

Np for helping

item.description:

open client. ctrl+h and top testscape . bottom your servers name and done. and ppl if u look at tuts i posted somethink there about this and u no what ppl just said .ppl wont need my tut well wtf is this then?

item.source: I got server source now how do i change the name?

item.title: I got server source now how do i change the name?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

No. WRONG! Lol. He means, like, when you log into a server, itll say “Welcome to Testscape” and he wants to change the name. To change the name, open up client.java and search for Welcome to Testscape or Welcome twice. Then, change that info and youre good ;).

Hope I helped!

~Lin

Read full topic

To make it say “Starting YOUSCAPE on port PORTNUMER”
go into server.java and look for w/e it usually says, and change it to what you want
